titles.title: Renewable Energy Financing Incentive Act of 2004
To provide incentives for investment in renewable energy facilities.
Renewable Energy Financing Incentive Act of 2004

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Renewable Energy Financing Incentive Act of 2004 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the nonrecognition of gain from the sale of real property if such gain is reinvested in renewable energy property within two years after the sale. Defines "renewable energy property" as a facility located in the United States which uses renewable energy sources as a primary feedstock for the generation of electricity or the manufacture of motor vehicle fuels.
